name: Robot Revolution (macro_scenery)
description:
In the distant year of 2045, Robots have taken over. In a robotic facility one human survives... taking control of the JLIN-01 they must escape this...

Robot Revolution Instructions

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move as you try to reach the escape door to exit the area.

Click the left button of the mouse to activate your flashlight, but watch out! Enemies will be able to find you more easily when your flashlight is on.

Click the right mouse button or Space Bar to blast a laser at the robots.  There is a cooldown between blasts, so use them wisely.

Avoid the robots (red) as you navigate through the level.  If you get too close they will chase you.

You have one life. Credits
